entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY AND MUCH COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY AND BREEZY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
BREEZY AND MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
